biocontainers.name: btrim
biocontainers.summary: This tool is made to remove tips (short dead ends) from a compacted de Bruijn graph and more generally to remove sequencing errors. Used in Bcool a short read corrector

biotools.summary: Fast and lightweight software to trim adapters and low quality regions in reads.

bioschemas.name: Btrim
bioschemas.summary: Fast and lightweight software to trim adapters and low quality regions in reads.
